clinical_study.brief_title: Study of S-1 Oxaliplatin (SOX) for Biliary Tract Cancer (BTC) (Ampullary Adenocarcinoma)
clinical_study.official_title: An Pilot Study of S-1 Combined With Oxaliplatin for First-line Treatment of Unresectable, Metastatic or Locally Advanced Biliary Tract Cancer or Ampullary Adenocarcinoma

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate efficacy and safety of S-1 Oxaliplatin (SOX) regimen to patients with unresectable, metastatic or locally advanced biliary tract or ampullary adenocarcinoma.

detailed_description.textblock: To list in cases with unresectable, metastatic or locally advanced biliary tract or ampullary adenocarcinoma that have not been treated before,confirm the efficacy and safety of combined S-1/L-OHP regimen for the biliary tract or ampullary carcinoma, providing evidence-based proof for the future treatment.

primary_outcome.description: to evaluate objective response rate (ORR) of SOX regimen to BTC (Ampullary Adenocarcinoma)

secondary_outcome.description: to evaluate survival data of overall survival (OS),Progression free Survival(PFS), safety outcome of SOX regimen to BTC (Ampullary Adenocarcinoma)

arm_group.description: unresectable, metastatic or locally advanced biliary tract or ampullary adenocarcinoma receive SOX regimen
